timeline.message:
Fix for zlinux JCL_Test_JITHelpers hangs on z15

Compare and branch condition has been chagned to greater than or equal
from greater than

This fix is based on @fjeremic's suggestion in https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/8159#issuecomment-568795948

Signed-off-by: Shubham Verma <shubhamv.sv@gmail.com>

Fix for zlinux JCL_Test_JITHelpers hangs on z15

Compare and branch condition has been changed to greater than or equal
from greater than

This fix is based on @fjeremic's suggestion in https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/8159#issuecomment-568795948

Signed-off-by: Shubham Verma <shubhamv.sv@gmail.com>

Disabled VSTRS optimizations for `inlineVectorizedStringIndexOf`

Signed-off-by: Shubham Verma <shubhamv.sv@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove this change as we are disabling the optimization temporarily and we're not sure yet whether this is correct.
timeline.author: fjeremic

timeline.bodyText:
Please open up an issue to get this addressed and add a TODO here (referencing the issue number) so it doesn't slip past our radar:
// TODO (#????): Re-enable VSTRS support in inlineVectorizedStringIndexOf
timeline.author: fjeremic
